name: Judas (itch)
description:
Objectives:

[Traitor] - Find and Stop theives from stealing, from your subject.
[Thief] - Find clues about the subject and Steal whats hidden.

Controls:
[WASD] - Movement
[Space] - Punch/Stun
[E] - Use / Interact Object
[F] - Steal
